problem_names: lemma R1: "H p (R p q) q"
lemma R2: "H p x q \<Longrightarrow> x \<le> R p q"
lemma R_cons: "t p \<le> t p' \<Longrightarrow> t q' \<le> t q \<Longrightarrow> R p' q' \<le> R p q"
lemma R_seq: "(R p r) \<cdot> (R r q) \<le> R p q"
lemma R_cond: "if v then (R (t v \<cdot> t p) q) else (R (n v \<cdot> t p) q) fi \<le> R p q"
lemma R_loop: "while q do (R (t p \<cdot> t q) p) od \<le> R p (t p \<cdot> n q)"
translations: lemma R1: "H p (R p q) q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. H p (R p q) q
using spec_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  (?x \<le> R ?p ?q) = H ?p ?x ?q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. H p (R p q) q
by blast
lemma R2: "H p x q \<Longrightarrow> x \<le> R p q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. H p x q \<Longrightarrow> x \<le> R p q
by (simp add: spec_def)
subsubsection\<open>Propositional Refinement Calculus\<close>
lemma R_skip: "1 \<le> R p p"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (1::'a) \<le> R p p
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (1::'a) \<le> R p p
have "H p 1 p"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. H p (1::'a) p
by (simp add: H_skip)

proof (state)
this:
  H p (1::'a) p

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (1::'a) \<le> R p p
thus ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  H p (1::'a) p

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (1::'a) \<le> R p p
by (rule R2)

proof (state)
this:
  (1::'a) \<le> R p p

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
lemma R_cons: "t p \<le> t p' \<Longrightarrow> t q' \<le> t q \<Longrightarrow> R p' q' \<le> R p q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>t p \<le> t p'; t q' \<le> t q\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> R p' q' \<le> R p q
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>t p \<le> t p'; t q' \<le> t q\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> R p' q' \<le> R p q
assume h1: "t p \<le> t p'" and h2: "t q' \<le> t q"

proof (state)
this:
  t p \<le> t p'
  t q' \<le> t q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>t p \<le> t p'; t q' \<le> t q\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> R p' q' \<le> R p q
have "H p' (R p' q') q'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. H p' (R p' q') q'
by (simp add: R1)

proof (state)
this:
  H p' (R p' q') q'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>t p \<le> t p'; t q' \<le> t q\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> R p' q' \<le> R p q
hence "H p (R p' q') q"

proof (prove)
using this:
  H p' (R p' q') q'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. H p (R p' q') q
using h1 h2 H_cons_1 H_cons_2

proof (prove)
using this:
  H p' (R p' q') q'
  t p \<le> t p'
  t q' \<le> t q
  \<lbrakk>t ?p \<le> t ?p'; H ?p' ?x ?q\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> H ?p ?x ?q
  \<lbrakk>t ?q' \<le> t ?q; H ?p ?x ?q'\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> H ?p ?x ?q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. H p (R p' q') q
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  H p (R p' q') q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>t p \<le> t p'; t q' \<le> t q\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> R p' q' \<le> R p q
thus ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  H p (R p' q') q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. R p' q' \<le> R p q
by (rule R2)

proof (state)
this:
  R p' q' \<le> R p q

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
lemma R_seq: "(R p r) \<cdot> (R r q) \<le> R p q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lparr>R p r\<rparr>R r q\<lparr>R p q\<rparr>
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lparr>R p r\<rparr>R r q\<lparr>R p q\<rparr>
have "H p (R p r) r" and "H r (R r q) q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. H p (R p r) r &&& H r (R r q) q
by (simp add: R1)+

proof (state)
this:
  H p (R p r) r
  H r (R r q) q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lparr>R p r\<rparr>R r q\<lparr>R p q\<rparr>
hence "H p ((R p r) \<cdot> (R r q)) q"

proof (prove)
using this:
  H p (R p r) r
  H r (R r q) q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. H p (R p r \<cdot> R r q) q
by (rule H_seq_swap)

proof (state)
this:
  H p (R p r \<cdot> R r q) q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lparr>R p r\<rparr>R r q\<lparr>R p q\<rparr>
thus ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  H p (R p r \<cdot> R r q) q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lparr>R p r\<rparr>R r q\<lparr>R p q\<rparr>
by (rule R2)

proof (state)
this:
  \<lparr>R p r\<rparr>R r q\<lparr>R p q\<rparr>

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
lemma R_cond: "if v then (R (t v \<cdot> t p) q) else (R (n v \<cdot> t p) q) fi \<le> R p q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. if v then R (t v \<cdot> t p) q else R (!v \<cdot> t p) q fi \<le> R p q
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. if v then R (t v \<cdot> t p) q else R (!v \<cdot> t p) q fi \<le> R p q
have "H (t v \<cdot> t p) (R (t v \<cdot> t p) q) q" and "H (n v \<cdot> t p) (R (n v \<cdot> t p) q) q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. H (t v \<cdot> t p) (R (t v \<cdot> t p) q) q &&&
    H (!v \<cdot> t p) (R (!v \<cdot> t p) q) q
by (simp add: R1)+

proof (state)
this:
  H (t v \<cdot> t p) (R (t v \<cdot> t p) q) q
  H (!v \<cdot> t p) (R (!v \<cdot> t p) q) q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. if v then R (t v \<cdot> t p) q else R (!v \<cdot> t p) q fi \<le> R p q
hence "H p (if v then (R (t v \<cdot> t p) q) else (R (n v \<cdot> t p) q) fi) q"

proof (prove)
using this:
  H (t v \<cdot> t p) (R (t v \<cdot> t p) q) q
  H (!v \<cdot> t p) (R (!v \<cdot> t p) q) q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. H p (if v then R (t v \<cdot> t p) q else R (!v \<cdot> t p) q fi) q
by (simp add: H_cond n_mult_comm)

proof (state)
this:
  H p (if v then R (t v \<cdot> t p) q else R (!v \<cdot> t p) q fi) q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. if v then R (t v \<cdot> t p) q else R (!v \<cdot> t p) q fi \<le> R p q
thus ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  H p (if v then R (t v \<cdot> t p) q else R (!v \<cdot> t p) q fi) q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. if v then R (t v \<cdot> t p) q else R (!v \<cdot> t p) q fi \<le> R p q
by (rule R2)

proof (state)
this:
  if v then R (t v \<cdot> t p) q else R (!v \<cdot> t p) q fi \<le> R p q

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
lemma R_loop: "while q do (R (t p \<cdot> t q) p) od \<le> R p (t p \<cdot> n q)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. while q do R (t p \<cdot> t q) p od \<le> R p (t p \<cdot> !q)
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. while q do R (t p \<cdot> t q) p od \<le> R p (t p \<cdot> !q)
have "H (t p \<cdot> t q) (R (t p \<cdot> t q) p)  p"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. H (t p \<cdot> t q) (R (t p \<cdot> t q) p) p
by (simp_all add: R1)

proof (state)
this:
  H (t p \<cdot> t q) (R (t p \<cdot> t q) p) p

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. while q do R (t p \<cdot> t q) p od \<le> R p (t p \<cdot> !q)
hence "H p (while q do (R (t p \<cdot> t q) p) od) (t p \<cdot> n q)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  H (t p \<cdot> t q) (R (t p \<cdot> t q) p) p

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. H p (while q do R (t p \<cdot> t q) p od) (t p \<cdot> !q)
by (simp add: H_loop)

proof (state)
this:
  H p (while q do R (t p \<cdot> t q) p od) (t p \<cdot> !q)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. while q do R (t p \<cdot> t q) p od \<le> R p (t p \<cdot> !q)
thus ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  H p (while q do R (t p \<cdot> t q) p od) (t p \<cdot> !q)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. while q do R (t p \<cdot> t q) p od \<le> R p (t p \<cdot> !q)
by (rule R2)

proof (state)
this:
  while q do R (t p \<cdot> t q) p od \<le> R p (t p \<cdot> !q)

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
lemma R_zero_one: "x \<le> R 0 1"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<le> R (0::'a) (1::'a)
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<le> R (0::'a) (1::'a)
have "H 0 x 1"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. H (0::'a) x (1::'a)
by (simp add: H_def)

proof (state)
this:
  H (0::'a) x (1::'a)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<le> R (0::'a) (1::'a)
thus ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  H (0::'a) x (1::'a)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<le> R (0::'a) (1::'a)
by (rule R2)

proof (state)
this:
  x \<le> R (0::'a) (1::'a)

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
lemma R_one_zero: "R 1 0 = 0"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. R (1::'a) (0::'a) = (0::'a)
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. R (1::'a) (0::'a) = (0::'a)
have "H 1 (R 1 0) 0"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. H (1::'a) (R (1::'a) (0::'a)) (0::'a)
by (simp add: R1)
thus ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  H (1::'a) (R (1::'a) (0::'a)) (0::'a)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. R (1::'a) (0::'a) = (0::'a)
by (simp add: H_def join.le_bot)

proof (state)
this:
  R (1::'a) (0::'a) = (0::'a)

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
end
end
